mapper.select: select hq_num, hq_name, pc_price, ware_price, ware_cnt, ware_date, part_num, emp_num from product
select h.hq_num, h.part_num, p.part_company, p.part_name, p.part_tel, p.part_email, p.part_code_name from product h join partner p on h.part_num = p.part_num where hq_num=#{param1}
select h.hq_num, p.part_code_name, h.hq_name, h.ware_price, h.ware_cnt, p.part_name, p.part_company, p.part_tel, p.part_email from product h join partner p on h.part_num = p.part_num
mapper.insert: insert into product(hq_num, part_num, hq_name, ware_cnt, ware_price, emp_num) values(product_sq.nextval, #{part_num}, #{hq_name}, #{ware_cnt}, #{ware_price}, #{emp_num})
